           CPU0       CPU1       CPU2       CPU3
  0:         22          0          0          0   IO-APIC   2-edge      timer
  1:          9          0          0          0   IO-APIC   1-edge      i8042
  8:          0          0          0          1   IO-APIC   8-edge      rtc0
  9:          0          0          0          0   IO-APIC   9-fasteoi   acpi
 12:        157          0          0          0   IO-APIC  12-edge      i8042
 16:   10000000          0          0          0   IO-APIC  16-fasteoi   i801_smbus
 23:   20000000          0          0          0   IO-APIC  23-fasteoi   ehci_hcd:usb1
 24:   30000000          0          0          0   PCI-MSI 524288-edge      eth0
 25:   15000000          0          0          0   PCI-MSI 524289-edge      nvme0q0
NMI:         10         10         10         10   Non-maskable interrupts
LOC:    2000000    2000000    2000000    2000000   Local timer interrupts
